attributes.action: Break off sporting links with any country that discriminates on grounds of sexuality
attributes.additional_details:
Britain broke off sporting links with South Africa under Apartheid, because the South African government relegated part of its populous to second class citizens because of them being born coloured.
We currently have sporting links with many, many countries who don't just relegate their citizens on account of being born gay, but have declared them illegal and opened them up to state sanctioned imprisonment, beatings and even murder.
This has to stop, by refusing to send sportsmen to these countries and refusing sportsmen from these countries from competing in the UK.
